item.name: Nyctessa's Staff
entries: This macabre staff is crafted from gleaming white bone, a spinal column spiralling out of its base with a skull swinging from the spine's tip. It was handcrafted for {@creature Nyctessa|WtD5} by her father, a powerful Blood Lord, from her mortal mother's bones.
When you damage a creature with Nyctessa's staff, that creature gains weakness 2 to negative damage until the end of your next turn.
You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

item.name: Bottled Night
entries: Tiny black motes swirl around this crystalline vial. The vial can be thrown up to 20 feet, shattering and releasing the motes to absorb light within a 15-foot burst. Light sources within the motes' area of effect create a 5-foot radius of {@quickref dim light||3|dim light} instead of their normal light and light sources outside the motes do not illuminate the area within them. The darkness lasts for 1 minute, but will disperse immediately in a strong wind.

item.name: Plate of Yled
entries: This sinister suit of jet-black {@runeItem full plate||+1 armor potency|} was designed to bolster the {@creature graveknight||graveknights} of Yled's {@trait undead} armies, creating unstoppable legions.

The armor gains additional abilities if it is a {@creature graveknight}'s armor. If a graveknight wearing undamaged plate of Yled is destroyed, the armor rebuilds its body over the course of {@dice 1d10} rounds instead of {@dice 1d10} days. A living creature who dons the armor is affected by the {@curse graveknight's curse|B1} immediately instead of in 1 hour.

entries.requirements: Your previous action was a weapon {@action Strike} that reduced a living creature to 0 HP
entries: The creature is targeted with {@spell death knell} ({@dc 20})

craftReq: The metals used to create this armor must include a fragment from a previous {@creature graveknight}'s armor.

entries: The armor is {@runeItem full plate||+1 armor potency||resilient|} and the save DC is 24.
The armor is {@runeItem full plate||+2 armor potency||resilient|} and the save DC is 28.
The armor is {@runeItem full plate||+2 armor potency||greater resilient|} and the save DC is 31.

item.name: Steadfast Sentinel
entries: This catalyst is a bird's claw soaked in a mixture of blood and grave dirt. A {@spell shadow spy|DA} spell empowered by it creates an unusually long-lasting {@creature homunculus}. Instead of the spell expiring when you next make your daily preparations, you can renew it by expending a spell slot for {@spell shadow spy|DA} again, maintaining the same {@creature homunculus} so it can continue its observations. Steadfast sentinels are often used by powerful spellcasters of Geb to covertly monitor their rivals.

item.name: Steelscour
entries: A viscous acidic goo fills this glass vial, specially designed to eat through metallic objects. You can throw the steelscour as an {@trait alchemical} {@trait bomb}, targeting a {@trait metal} creature or metal object held by a creature. Steelscour has no effect on living or {@trait undead} flesh and deals half damage to objects constructed of non-metal materials.

Instead of using steelscour as a bomb, you can pour it on an adjacent unattended metal object with an {@action Interact} action, automatically dealing the listed {@condition persistent damage||persistent acid damage} for 5 rounds with no flat check to end the condition. When used this way, steelscour loses the {@trait bomb} trait.
It deals {@damage 1d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent acid damage} that ignores up to 5 hardness from metal.
You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. It deals {@damage 2d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent acid damage} that ignores up to 5 hardness from metal.
You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. It deals {@damage 3d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent acid damage} that ignores up to 10 hardness from metal.
You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. It deals {@damage 4d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent acid damage} that ignores up to 15 hardness from metal.

item.name: Void Salts
entries: This sachet is filled with a fine powder that seethes with energy distilled directly from the {@plane Negative Energy Plane}. When used in casting a {@spell grim tendrils} spell, void salts allow you to split the area of the spell, creating any number of lines originating from you that total 30 feet in length. A creature that multiple lines pass through is only affected once.
